Sync Options Manual Sync A background refresh interval must be turned on for these notifications to occur. How you want to be notified: vibrate, sound, LED, etc. To close a window on the tablet, simply click the dimmed area outside the window.

Scrolling Options This will make it so the app bar, compose FAB, and snackbar do not disappear when scrolling. List Refresh Rate This will perform a background sync for any lists that you use as extra pages on the main timeline. Timeline Pictures Set the style of pictures you want to see as you scroll your timeline. Normal Pictures Smaller Pictures No Pictures Quick Actions Like Successful Become a 2019 SUPPORTER You are a 2019 SUPPORTER! Thanks! Your support is immensely appreciated. If there is anything I can do, don't hesitate to ask. Automatic TweetMarker will always refresh the timeline on startup of the app. People No preview is available for this video service. Timeline Autoplay Automatically play Mastodon GIFs and videos without leaving the timeline. Use Higher Quality Images Applied throughout the entire app. View Likes View Boosts List Size Max number of posts to store for a swipable list, in the database. Quotes No quotes Tweet Style How you want your posts to look on the timeline. Compact Tweet Layout Locale Selection for Translations Not all translations are complete. This will download images after a background refresh, so that they are immediately available in the app. These notifications will go off after a background refresh has been completed. Discover Section Options Clear Memory Manage Mutes You may need to remove, then re-add the widget to your homescreen, to apply these changes. Material Design Light Material Design Dark Fully Transparent Disabling the in-app browser will send you to your default browser when opening links. Default (No reverse actions):
- Short Click = Expand In-Line
- Long Click = Tweet Viewer Show Images on the Widget This setting is ignored on the compact layout. Use "Peeking" Long click profile pictures, images, videos, and GIFs from the timeline to get a preview of their content. Line Spacing This setting will not apply if you are using the compact layout. Huge Big Regular Small Tiny Dual Pages (Landscape) Shows two swipable pages, side-by-side, in landscape mode. You can't quote a protected account! You can't retweet a protected account! Copied Link! The original tweet was probably deleted. Compose Tweet Compose DM My Account Preparing video… Capture Video Detailed Quotes Show more information in quoted posts on the timeline. Open in Web Web Browser Article Enhancer (Readability) Compact posts (No Pictures) Selected User's Posts User Page Size Max number of posts to store for a swipable user page, in the database. Authenticate Enable Fingerprint Lock Disable Fingerprint Lock Auto-complete Hashtags Show recently searched or viewed hashtags, when composing a new tweet. Auto-complete Followers Do not search all of Mastodon when auto-completing a mention. Quoting Show All Posts Are you sure you want to unfollow this user? Are you sure you want to follow this user? Are you sure you want to mark this tweet as spam? Use Larger Images Reply to others Compress Reply Handles This improves handling of long reply chains on Mastodon. Interaction Notifications Never show notifications 
Intercept push notifications from the Mastodon app
 To use this feature, you must enable Focus for Mastodon, on the next screen. This allows the app to listen for notifications from the Mastodon app Widget Refresh Notifications Media Download Notifications Tweeting Notifications Tweet Failed Notifications Background Refresh Notifications Interaction Notifications Sending Schedule Tweet Notifications Favorite User Notifications Mention Notifications Direct Message Notifications Notification Channels Update Tweet
Rate it! Top ratings go a long way No thanks Preview Web Links Automatically parse and display the title and image of the link when the tweet contains a link Use Drag to Dismiss Navigate back to the previous screen by dragging up or down at the top or bottom of a tweet or profile %1$d seconds ago %1$d minute ago %1$d minutes agorequl %1$d hour ago %1$d hours ago %1$d day ago %1$d days ago Timeline Style Tweet Layout Display Screenname To access your saved tweets, head to the swipe-able pages section of settings and set up a Saved Posts page. Only Autoplay GIFs By default, both GIFs and Mastodon videos are played directly on the timeline. Data Saver Mode This will override some of your current settings to give you the least amount of background data usage.
No posts! To fill this page, start following some users. You can find people to follow from the Discover section, or by searching for different topics. No mentions! To fill this page, talking to others. As they reply, their posts will show up on this page. No direct messages! To fill this page, you can start sending direct messages. You can start a new direct message from Focus for Mastodon's compose page. No liked posts! To fill this page, just like a user's status. As you like different tweets, they will show up on this page. No bookmarked posts! To fill this page, just bookmark a user's status, they will show up on this page. No posts! To fill this page, start adding some user's to this list. No posts found! Try changing your search query. No posts found! As this user tweets, their statuses will show up here. Add a saved tweet by opening it, and selecting the option to save it for later. No users found! If you favorite a user, from their profile, you will be able to quickly find and access them, from this page. No boosts found! As you interact on Mastodon, this page will show all of your personal posts that have been retweeted by others. No saved searches! To quickly look back at old searches, you can save that search for later. When you do, they will appear on this page. No lists created! You can create a list from the option in the three dot overflow menu. After creating a list, add users to that list to quickly find their content.
Storage Permission Focus for Mastodon needs the storage permission to be able to save media. You can grant this permission from your system settings. Permissions Required Focus for Mastodon needs both the camera and the microphone permission, to be able to record videos. Please accept this permission to continue. Focus for Mastodon needs both the camera and the microphone permission, to be able to record videos. You can grant this permission from your system settings. Follow System
Your account data , favorite users , posts and so on can be automatically updated in the background , even when the app is not running Background sync interval You can let Focus for Mastodon intercept and replace push notifications coming from Mastodon , to get faster mentions and activity notifications . Make sure to have the official app installed
